name: Baltic Seaplane GmbH
about: Baltic Seaplane GmbH, located in the stunning Flensburg Fjord of Germany, is the premier provider of seaplane training in the region. As a leading aviation institution, we offer comprehensive training programs, including SEP (Sea) and SEP (Land) training, as well as extensions and renewals of seaplane ratings. Our courses, conducted on aircraft such as the Cessna 172 Amphib, are designed to create skilled and versatile aviators capable of landing on both water and land. With a focus on safety and excellence, Baltic Seaplane GmbH is dedicated to turning your aviation dreams into reality. Join us to elevate your flying skills in a unique and exciting environment.
